name: Pressure Madness
description:
The theme was "Madness":

It might not really be super clear, but you will understand how this game correlates to madness when it's the 5th time you have to roll around the board destroying the progress you made so far :P.

Also I did not plan ahead so I had to make this up lol.

Controls: 

WASD or ArrowKeys to move
Space to start
R to reload the game

Notes:

1) Difference between the easy and challenge version is just the number of pressure pads to light up.

2) The highscore does not work as of now, I ran out of time and did not think about it resetting with each run -.-

3) There’s an exploit that if you press space during the game it will reset the time and not the entire board, you’re only supposed to press space to start and not during gameplay
